description: The name Choral is mentioned only by Williams, who says: �Choral was sometimes used in late 18th-cent. organs of south Germany for a Mixture of solo function (Cornet).� The name Choralmixtur is not described in the literature; we assume it to be a synonym.
examplesDescription: No examples of Choral are known. Contributions welcome.

examples.name: Choralmixtur IV, Pedal; Dom, Halberstadt, Germany; Eule 1965.
Choralmixtur IV, Pedal; Kreuzkirche, Dresden, Germany; Jehmlich 1963.
